name: @explorables/flockn_roll
title: Flock'n Roll
subtitle: Collective Animal Behavior
description: This is a model for collective behavior in animals, e.g. flocks of birds or schools of fish based on simple rules of interaction.
author: Dirk Brockmann (https://synosy.github.io)

scripts.release: vite build && npm version patch && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --access public
